name: Demon Overdrive
description:
Demon Overdrive is a pixel-art action game where you traverse the streets of a crumbling city, searching for your prey.

Be careful: you are not the only hunter down here.

The game is an experimental project about finding a new pixel-art creation pipeline, using 3D models to generate fast and beatiful 2D characters. Thanks to this innovative technique, used in hits like Dead Cells, we can achieve vibrant and dynamic pixel-art in record time.

Mind that there are not short-term plans to make this a complete game, althought I would like to make a full release someday.

The memory of the project, were you will find a full report of the development of Demon Overdriver, is planed to be made public next month.

Until that, feel free to play the game, report bugs, or contact me if you have any interrogant about the project.

~Enjoy!
Game controller recommended.

Developed by Carlos Cabreira.

Music by Guillermo Otero Costas.
